price: 16. Est-il donc possible qu’une fois morts, réduits en poussière et en ossements, nous soyons ressuscités ?
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
